summary:
New armor set + weapon.
Vaermina follow her, follow your dreams.
They could one day become your nightmares.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GtnOS8d.png[/img]
------------------------------------------------------
Adds:
- Cultist of Vaermina Boots
- Cultist of Vaermina Gloves
- Cultist of Vaermina Robes
- Cultist of Vaermina Hood

- Cultist of Vaermina Dagger

- Vaermina Priests NPC
- Vaermina Guard Npc
- Cultist of Vaermina Npc

- Treasure of Vaermina Location/Dungeon

EFFECTS ARMOR + WEAPONS :

[img]http://i.imgur.com/9Lj1Tvz.png[/img]
-------------------------------------------------------
HOW?
- Go to Treasure of Vaermina and enter the dungeon. Fight your way trough the Vaermina priests, Guards and Cultist Leader.
- Kill The Cultist of Vaermina and loot his body to get the key for a chest.
- Open the chest and loot the armor.
- Female and male mesh are the same.
-------------------------------------------------------
Thx to :
- bethesda
- Skyrim
- Nifskope
- Photoshop
- Creation Kit
- Blender

Sry for the bad english
Steam -> http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=315460162
